QuestData.Title: Keep Them On Task
QuestData.Description:
Princess Talanji's actions have thrown off our pursuers. Her loa is powerful indeed.
We need to be certain if there were survivors, they do not gain a foothold on Zandalar. I am concerned that our Forsaken compatriots might get... overzealous. Please keep an eye on them, and remind them of what is honorable.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Dennis Grimtale at Talanji's Rebuke.
